meanings.definition: To have a strong desire for something.
meanings.sent1: I crave chocolate when I see it in the store.
meanings.sent2: She craves adventure and loves trying new things.
meanings.sent3: The cat craves attention and always wants to be petted.
meanings.sent4: His soul craves freedom like a bird yearning to soar.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread made her crave a warm slice.

meanings.sent1: Children often crave summer vacation for the fun times.
meanings.sent2: He craves success and works hard to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent3: The puppy craves playtime and gets excited when the ball comes out.
meanings.sent4: Her heart craves love like a flower thirsting for rain.
meanings.sent5: The traveler craves new experiences and seeks out different cultures.

meanings.sent1: I crave your forgiveness for my mistake.
meanings.sent2: They crave your assistance in completing the project.
meanings.sent3: The student craves extra credit to improve their grade.
meanings.sent4: The beggar craves a kind soul to offer help in his time of need.
meanings.sent5: The patient craves relief from pain and seeks medical attention.
